alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 1:28PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Flagler, southeastern Alachua, northern Marion and southern Putnam Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 128 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Satsuma to 9 miles southwest of Cross Creek. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Palatka, Crescent City, Pomona Park, Fort McCoy, Salt Springs, Andalusia, Citra, Lake Delancy and Sparr. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Western Marion; Western Putnam
